definition[0]: to make someone feel calmer and less anxious, upset, or angry
example[0]: Lucy soothed the baby by rocking it in her arms.
example[1]: She made a cup of tea to soothe her nerves.
definition[1]: to make a pain become less severe, or slowly disappear
example[2]: I bought some lozenges to soothe my sore throat.
example[3]: Massage can gently soothe away your aches and pains.
